Georgia and Armenia arein process to adopt law on Flour Fortification.

575R/A0/09/703/007.status_value: 12 countries from the region are planning to participate in a joint UNICEF/OECD Regional Seminar on Improving Equity in Learning Outcomes. This seminar is intended to be a hands-on opportunity for countries to gain technical expertise and concrete guidance on: (1) how to analyze PISA results  (2) how to apply PISA results to improving learning in the country  and (3) how to improve policies to better support learning for the most marginalized groups.
575R/A0/09/703/007.indicator_name: Number of COs with activities to support government to: develop mechanisms and tools to assess and improve education quality and learning achievements.
